name: Skytsuri
description:
Set in contemporary Japan, the player is tasked to climb the top of Tokyo's highest tower, the Tokyo Skytree.

Skytsuri is a 2.5D platformer PC game that I, together with three other students, worked on in the first semester at the Games Academy in Berlin. Among other things, as a level designer, I designed a total of nine levels and then implemented them in Unity 3D.
